values: Public Worship in a Secular World: What, Why and How, Session 2Public Worship in a Secular World: What, Why and How, Session 2

When churches gather in corporate worship, rock-solid doctrine and intense emotion ought to work side by side. God wants both our minds and our hearts when we worship.
